TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. New =/= better.

I wish for \

granted but mailing it to you made it a /

i wish for the source engine

Granted, but it explodes your computer and send endless kerbals flowing out of your broken moniter prepared to attack you.

I wish for KSP 2.0 and a non-laggy computer

Granted.

Ahem.

INTRODUCING

Kerbal Space Program 2.0

by EA

Buy now for the free Basic Rocket Parts DLC!

But that ends up happening... At least you have a not laggy computer, but it doesn't have internet access, and thus cannot connect to ksp's DRM servers

I wish for the Patched Conics DLC (9.99$)

Edited June 1, 2015 by temporalExile

Granted. You also need to pay for the Tracking Station Upgrade DLC ($19.99)

I wish for a life elemental bear doctor.

Granted. The element of your life bear doctor ends up being plutonium, and you are arrested for possession of Pu without a license. You get a cell next to Dman.

I wish for more corruptions based off of previous corruptions

Granted. You don't have the PED suit.

I wish, for wishing a wish, that my wished wish will be wished for in my wish by my wish.

granted, buth your wish was washed while wishing a wish

I wish that no one will reply next

Hello!

I want ea to revive maxis.

Granted, but Max is upset that he didn't die and tries another way to go.

I wish that I could get out of my cell.

Granted. You need each of them to live, but then again, you are the cells. If you're a home for your cells to live, where are you in all of it?

I wish I knew.

granted but the knowledge was never meant to be known by mere humans (or pokemon) so you go crazy screaming in the corner for help

i wish for a pun

Granted. Don't take this one for it.

I wish for another pun.

Plesiosaurus to meet you. I made that joke porpoiselly. Those are the only two puns left in existence.

I wish for Human Space Program

Granted, but you are the main character and everyone kills you in rocket crashes.

I want a llama.

Granted, but it comes with a duck and an annoying song.

I wish for the answer to life, the universe, and everything.

42.

I wish for something.

You get everything,including enough water to drown you and your videogames (especially starfox).

- - - Updated - - -

I wish for kerbals as my servants.

Granted. They can't do anything but plant flags and write crew reports with their space mittens.

I wish for mittens that can summon flags.

granted but they summon flags halfway through your head.

i wish i knew how to post on this forum

Granted, but you learn so much your head blows up.

- - - Updated - - -

I wish for the world's biggest hammer and Axe Cop's axe.
Granted, but someone drops it on you as they are handing it to you.

Granted, but because it is the worlds biggest hammer you get smashed by it.

I wish this thread did not exist.

Granted

I wish more people knew how to write hidden messages

Granted but that means they're no longer hidden.

I wish modern art was artistic.
